klein-tools-ti250-hidden-worlds.title: The Hidden Worlds of the Klein Tools TI250 Thermal Imager
klein-tools-ti250-hidden-worlds.summary: A deep dive into hidden data encoded in the BMP files saved by the Klein Tools TI250 thermal imager.

apple-id-security-questions.title: To Apple ID or not to Apple ID, that is the security question.
apple-id-security-questions.summary: An absurd tale of my experience trying to reset the security questions on an Apple ID account.

76482-tiles-long.title: (This Song’s Just) 76,482 Tiles Long
76482-tiles-long.summary: I assembled and uploaded a video showing a timelapse road trip from Pittsburgh, PA to San Mateo, CA. Here I share the tricks and pitfalls I discovered in my work.

youtube-audio-content-id.title: Fun with YouTube’s Audio Content ID System
youtube-audio-content-id.summary: A series of tests designed to try to thwart the audio portion of YouTube’s Content ID digital fingerprinting system.

gave-without-taking.title: You came and you gave without taking. Like a BitTorrent seed.
gave-without-taking.summary: Determining the speed and tempo variations in the Barry Manilow’s 1974 hit “Mandy.”

everybody-imitates-hypnotoad.title: Everybody Imitates Hypnotoad
everybody-imitates-hypnotoad.summary: Synthesizing Futurama’s “Angry Machine” sound effect from scratch using a noise generator and a few filters.

block-party.title: Block Party
block-party.summary: A self-made block diagram for the Behringer SL2442FX-PRO mixer.

quicktime-7.4.title: Hey Hey, Ho Ho, QuickTime 7.4 Has Got To Go
quicktime-7.4.summary: In January 2008, Apple released version 7.4 of QuickTime which had the unfortunate side-effect of breaking video rendering in After Effects. This article explored a method to revert the installed version of QuickTime back to 7.3.

0dbfs-for-vendetta.title: 0 dBFS for Vendetta
0dbfs-for-vendetta.summary: A list of some of the loudest-sounding songs in my music collection, and a plea to bring back dynamic range.

armchair-audio-engineer.title: The Armchair Audio Engineer
armchair-audio-engineer.summary: An analysis of strange digital compression artifacting present on certain tracks of “Chef Aid: The South Park Album.”
